dt-option.summary: The strings appended to hours to distinguish between am and pm.

type.description: This is an array that has 2 elements to represent am and pm respectively.

dt-option.description: The strings within the array are appended to the hours in the selection when a 12 hour format is being used. This allows the user to differentiate between am and pm times.
